title: Proteogenomics 1: Database Creation
questions: How to create a customized Protein Database from RNAseq data?
objectives: Generating a customized Protein sequence database with variants, indels, splice junctions and known sequences.
key_points: Generating genomic and variant mapping files for visualization

contributors.name: James Johnson
contributors.in_memoriam: James ‘JJ’ Johnson, was a Galaxy community rock star most known for his indispensable contributions to the Galaxy Proteomics community. JJ’s works will live on in so many Galaxy tools and workflows for years to come.

workflows.name: GTN Proteogenomics1 Database Creation
workflows.title: GTN Proteogenomics1 Database Creation
workflows.description: Proteogenomics Galaxy Training Network Database Creation
